samondal, 10/14/2025: This is working fine and tested in DEV2 instance. Attached the test result in the attachment section.
Item description having more than 240 characters

Item description in oracle is having 240 character limit. For few items in iValua is having more than 240 characters and that is coming to Salesforce and then to Oracle. As Oracle consider this as bad data, all the items in that load file getting failed due this issue. Example: If a load file is having 1000 item records, even if 1 item is having more than 240 characters as description, the whole load process will fail.
Solution approach: Item description will need to contain within the charter limit and Mulesoft integration will truncate the description and send only the first 240 character for each item.

Please complete the following fields that are currently missing information:
Quote Line Item - PN-R496: Revenue Type Level 1
Quote Line Item - PN-R496: Cost Category
Quote Line Item - PN-R496: Delivery Mode
Quote Line Item - PN-R496: Subscription Term
Quote Line Item - PN-R496: Annual Price
